name: Idea Com Mid-America
overview:
We at Idea Com have served the communication needs of thousands of customers in the Upper Midwest since 1954 from our offices in St. Paul, Rochester, Duluth, Fargo, and Des Moines. We are pioneers in this business and we have built our foundation on our values in stability, experience and exceptional customer service.

While many providers sell and install products, we know that it takes more than the right product to make a great communication system! We are dedicated to keeping our clients educated about any and all emerging technologies while keeping it simple and straightforward. Installation is completed by experts in the field. Our average technician has worked at Idea Com for more than 10 years and carries at least 4 certifications. Our service personnel are available 24 hours a day and will be available respond to critical communications failures in 2 hours or less.
